definition: abbr. for 非洲[Fei1 zhou1], Africa
to not be/not/wrong/incorrect/non-/un-/in-/to reproach or blame/(colloquial) to insist on/simply must

sentences.english: Having been dehumanized in turn, they will embrace inhumanity and brutality.
sentences.chinese: 既已被非人化，他们将拥抱非人性和残暴。

sentences.english: Having been dehumanized in turn, they will embrace inhumanity and brutality.
sentences.chinese: 既已被非人化，他们将拥抱非人性和残暴。

sentences.english: Tommy said that he was dehumanized by his teachers, psychiatrists, and social workers.
sentences.chinese: 托米说他受到老师，精神病专家和社工的非人道对待。

sentences.english: He was taught by his father to never let non-humans get the better of him in life.
sentences.chinese: 他的父亲教导他，这辈子千万不要输给非人类种族。

sentences.english: Will Guild Wars 2 have non-human playable races?
sentences.chinese: 激战2将会有非人的总称的人种操作么？

sentences.english: Away to the west gate formation is purely natural, non-labor carved.
sentences.chinese: 西天门纯粹是自然形成，非人工雕琢而成。

sentences.english: In praise of Character in the Bleak inhuman Loneliness.
sentences.chinese: 去颂扬布利克式非人孤独的人物。

sentences.english: People from north african countries have an arabic rather than a negroid appearance.
sentences.chinese: 北非人具有阿拉伯人的外表，跟黑人不一样。

sentences.english: Such inhuman life, in other girls who are also staged.
sentences.chinese: 这种非人的生活，在其他女孩身上也同样上演着。

sentences.english: Climate change is probably also causing an increase in non-human diseases.
sentences.chinese: 气候变化也有可能导致非人类疾病的增加。

sentences.english: Yet a small minority argue that the cruel and inhumane tradition should be kept alive.
sentences.chinese: 仅一小部分人主张继续这种野蛮和非人道的传统。

sentences.english: Without activists, the only non-human animals would be farmed animals.
sentences.chinese: 没有他们，唯一的非人类的动物只会是家畜。

sentences.english: Wei's death, I will give companies in the free supply.
sentences.chinese: 温泉鱼属非人为的死亡，我公司将给于免费的补给。

sentences.english: No one can stand this mind-numbing and dehumanizing work.
sentences.chinese: 没有人能够忍受这种麻木的非人般的工作。

sentences.english: And then it becomes the non-human animals and the environment.
sentences.chinese: 再再然后它变成了非人类动物和自然环境的代表。

sentences.english: The Empire, in contrast, has made discrimination against non-humans a longstanding policy.
sentences.chinese: 相反，帝国则把歧视非人类种族当作一项长期国策。

definition: to loathe/to hate/to abhor/see also 憎惡|憎恶[zeng1 e4]
to hate evil/see also 憎惡|憎恶[zeng1 wu4]
